name: Naitik P.
content: Hey, I'm Naitik, I'm a 4th year CSGD and Economics student. I'm the competitive director for LoL and CS2 since the last 2 years! I'm deeply committed to nurturing a competitive atmosphere that values growth, camaraderie, and fun. If you share my esports passion, you're in the right spot at Slug Gaming.

name: Kaitlyn E.
content: Kaitlyn "axo" Eng (she/they) is a 3rd year Computer Science major and in charge of anything Valorant related in Slug Gaming. She used to play Valorant competitively but now focuses on streaming, drawing, and editing. She loves anything kirby, cat or pink related. Feel free to contact her at her discord (@axolotlly) or on twitter (https://x.com/axolotlly)

name: Zosia T.
content: My name is Zosia "Jaguar" Trela (she/they) and I'm a 3rd year Computer Science Game Design Major. This is my second year as Overwatch Director and third year as a player. During my free time, I enjoy hiking, gardening and streaming. You can contact me on discord @ jaguwuar or follow me on twitter @ OwJaguar and twitch @ JaguarHeart.

name: Reed B.
content: Hi my name is Reed, I am a Co-Founder of the Apex Legends Program at Slug Gaming. I am currently on medical leave for Lyme Disease, when I return I will be finishing my degree in Computer Engineering. Most of my free time revolves around Apex, when I am not managing things for UCSC I am either playing Apex or getting involved in the T2 scene.

name: Charlotte B.
content: Hiiiii! I’m a first-year Computer Science: Computer Game Design major and lifelong Nintendo fan! My favorite Nintendo franchises are Pokemon, Animal Crossing, and, of course, Splatoon! I didn’t start playing Splatoon until the Unicorn vs. Narwhal Splatfest in Splatoon 2, but I’ve been obsessed ever since. I tend to stay within a Nintendo bubble when it comes to video games and currently only play on Nintendo consoles :)

name: Kade M.
content: slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug slug
